intro: Isolepis tenuissima, commonly known as slender spike-rush, is a species of flowering plant in the family Cyperaceae. It is a small, herbaceous plant that typically grows in wet or marshy environments. The plant has narrow, grass-like leaves and produces small, clustered inflorescences. It is often found in temperate regions and is adapted to moist, nutrient-poor soils. Isolepis tenuissima plays a role in stabilizing wetland soils and providing habitat for small aquatic organisms.
